org.opengrok.indexer.util

Class LineBreaker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.util.LineBreaker

  • public class LineBreaker
extends Object
    Represents a reader of source text to find end-of-line tokens -- in accordance with StringUtils.STANDARD_EOL -- in order to determine line offsets but discarding line content.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LineBreaker()

      Gets the number of broken lines.

      Gets the number of characters in the original source document.

      Calls reset(org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.StreamSource, org.opengrok.indexer.util.ReaderWrapper) with src and null.
      void reset(StreamSource src, ReaderWrapper wrapper)
      Resets the breaker using the specified inputs.

      • getPosition

        public int getPosition(int offset)
        Gets the starting document character position of the line at the specified offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to count()
        Returns:
        line length, including the end-of-line token
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if offset is out of bounds
